summary.span: 命名空间包含 类和一组相关的缓存数据类。

span.span: The namespace contains the class and a set of related cached data classes.

summary.span: 这些类旨在用于管理属于使用 Visual Studio 中 Office 开发工具创建的文档级自定义的文档和工作簿的各个方面。

span.span: These classes are intended to be used to manage aspects of documents and workbooks that are part of document-level customizations created by using Office development tools in Visual Studio,

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用类来执行以下任务：You can use the class to perform the following tasks: - 访问和修改文档或工作簿的文档级自定义的一部分的数据缓存中的数据。Access and modify data in the data cache of a document or workbook that is part of a document-level customization. - 以编程方式在运行时，将自定义程序集附加到文档或工作簿或删除文档或工作簿的自定义程序集。Programmatically attach a customization assembly to a document or workbook at run time, or remove a customization assembly from a document or workbook. - 确定文档或工作簿具有自定义程序集或数据缓存。Determine whether a document or workbook has a customization assembly or a data cache. - 获取文档中，与关联的部署清单的 URL，或将 URL 更改。Get the URL of the deployment manifest that is associated with the document, or change the URL. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [使用 ServerDocument 类管理服务器上的文档](/visualstudio/vsto/managing-documents-on-a-server-by-using-the-serverdocument-class.md)。For more information, see [Managing Documents on a Server by Using the ServerDocument Class](/visualstudio/vsto/managing-documents-on-a-server-by-using-the-serverdocument-class.md).
